subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The Daytona 500’s purse will be about $18.4 million, the highest ever for a race in the United States. The winner of the Feb. 18 race, Nascar’s showpiece, will get at least $1.44 million, another record, according to a news release from Daytona International Speedway. Prizes for the top finishers are about $350,000 higher than last year.Purses for the event, which starts the season for Nascar’s top-level Nextel Cup series, have grown since television ratings for the Daytona 500 overtook those of the Indianapolis 500 in 1995. Last year’s Indy 500 purse was $10.2 million.
